speaker.whotheyare: Zoë Karl-Waithaka is a partner at BCG in Nairobi.
speaker.whylisten: With more than ten years experience in management consulting, Zoë Karl-Waithaka advises businesses in strategy and operations across industries throughout sub-Saharan Africa. Her deep expertise in change management and large-scale organizational transformations has led her to designing and improving food systems across East Africa. Born in the United States, and with roots in South Africa and Eswatini, she is passionate about contributing to the growth of the African continent. She holds an MBA from the Wharton School and is a fellow of the Archbishop Tutu Leadership Programme.
